column1: # Purpose: Tracks user sick leave periods for validation in agentic investigation workflows.
# Used by agents to verify user claims during HR mutation investigations.

# - StartDate: Start date of sick leave (YYYY-MM-DD)
# - EndDate: End date of sick leave (YYYY-MM-DD)
